API Documentation

Base URL

https://releasetrain.io/api/v

Component Endpoints

  1. Get Component by Name and Version

    GET /api/c/name/:componentName/:versionNumber?

    Gets a component by its name and optional version number.

    curl http://localhost:3000/api/c/name/android/Lollipop.0.0

    Python Example

    import requests

url = 'http://localhost:3000/api/c/name/android/Lollipop.0.0'
response = requests.get(url)
if response.status_code == 200:
    print(response.json())
else:
    print('Failed to fetch data:', response.status_code)

Version Endpoints

  1. Update Version

    PUT /api/v/:id

    Updates a version document by its ID.

    curl -X PUT https://releasetrain.io/api/v/12345 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"newFieldName": "newValue"}'

    Python Example

    import requests

url = 'https://releasetrain.io/api/v/12345'
data = {'newFieldName': 'newValue'}
response = requests.put(url, json=data)
if response.status_code == 200:
    print(response.text)
else:
    print('Failed to update data:', response.status_code)
